summary:
Make your Skyrim just a bit more crazy... With cwazy that strive to be subtle and random. 
Make suggestions for future things in the comments, they WILL be added!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11153-1-1331176023.png[/img][/center]

[center]This mod aims to aim at nothing. The only point here is to give at least one person a good 
chuckle, and then be on our merry ways. 

It also aims to be updated with just about any suggestions that are made in the comment section for this mod. Make the suggestion, and it will probably happen soon. But remember, only textures until I specify otherwise. 
If you like it, make suggestions! If you don\'t, be respectful and don\'t say anything demeaning or mean. It\'s my first file, \'gotta start somewhere!

If you like it, please endorse! 

__________________________________________________________________
INSTALLATION:

Installing this is very simple. Follow these steps:

1.  Extract the folder, \"textures\" to C:\\STEAM\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
2. Play! 

OR 

1. Use Manager Button.
2. Reflect on how simple that was. 
3. Play!

That\'s it! If it doesn\'t work, tell me in the comments; because it should work!
____________________________________________________________________________________
What should I make next? Choose one of these and say in your choice in a comment: 

1. A remake of certain enemies to be more... cwazy. (Turn the Giants mesh into a penis, wolf into a Mightyeana/Poochyeana, all with matching textures, sounds, etc... 

or 

2. A dungeon/quest with some custom Cwazy textures! ________________________________________________________________________________________
My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12379]Profane Skyrim[/url]	
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18970]Better Skyrim Intro[/url]	
_____________________________________________________________________________________

Credit to:

Photoshop
Bethesda Softworks for the slice of sex-cake that is Skyrim!
Anyone who downloads this!
And me, I did the Re-Tex\'s[/center]
author: BOBONATOR2
